name: Glow Clear, Color Correcting Self-Tanning Mousse
about: What it is:A water-based self-tanning mousse with color-correcting technology to even skin tone for a natural-looking, hydrated glow..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Formulation:Lightweight Mousse.Highlighted Ingredients:.Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free. It comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:Packed with natural tanning actives like avocado, chia seed, and coconut oils, Glow Clear delivers a hydrated, natural-looking, bronzed tan with no streaks, smells, or orange tones. The tinted self-tanning mousse with color-correcting actives features either a peach (light), green (medium), or violet (dark) base, while the clear, vegan, water-to-foam formula dries quickly and doesnâ€™t transfer.
ingredients: Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Water, Dihydroxyacetone, Propylene Glycol, Ethoxydiglycol, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Glycerin , Decyl Glucoside, Glycereth-26, Erythrulose, Tropaeolum Majus Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Panthenol, Aloe Barbadensis Extract, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil , Salvia Hispanica Seed Oil, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Oil, Agastache Mexicana Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Methoxyphenyl t-Butylphenyl Propanediol, Ascorbic Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Propanediol, Sodium Metabisulfite, Parfum (Fragrance), Phenoxyethanol, Triethylene Glycol....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Exfoliate 24 hours before tanning..-Moisturize dry areas such as hands, feet, knees, ankles, and elbows prior to application..-Pump product onto mitt and apply in broad strokes. Leave hands and feet until last, sweeping lightly over..-Your tan will develop in four to six hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like the formula, but the pump broke right awat!
